q1: Do you think Bayern Munich is the all-time best German football club?
a1: Yes! I can't wait to see how they perform under Niko Kovac.
q2: Who are the best team players for Bayern Munich?
a2: I think Arturo Vidal and Arjen Robben are very important players for Bayern Munich.
q3: Do you think Bayern Munich can compete for the Champions League title?
a3: They can win the Champions League, but there a few things that need to go their way before doing that. With the squad Bayern have and Ancelotti at the helm I see them going very far this year!
